questions.question: What was the title of the incident?
What was the date and time of the incident?
What was a brief description of the incident?
Who were the key stakeholders involved?

description: Provide a chronological list of key events that occurred.

questions.question: For each event, what was the timestamp?

nested_questions.question: What was the description of this event?
Who was involved in this event?
What was the impact at this point?

description: Assess the impact of the incident.

questions.question: What was the primary impact on users or systems?
What was the estimated financial impact (if applicable)?
Were there any other significant impacts (e.g., reputational)?

description: Identify the underlying causes of the incident.

questions.question: What was the technical root cause?
What were the process-related root causes?
What were the human-related root causes?

description: Document key takeaways from the incident.

questions.question: What specific lessons were learned regarding technology?
What specific lessons were learned regarding processes?
What specific lessons were learned regarding team collaboration and communication?

description: Define concrete steps to prevent recurrence and improve processes.

questions.question: For each action item, what is the description?

nested_questions.question: Who is the owner of this action item?
What is the target completion date?
What is the status of this action item?
